ModMetaData.name: VA-CO Blood and Pain
ModMetaData.author: Aristocat
ModMetaData.description:
- Injuries cause bleeding three times more.
- Injuries cause twice more pain and thrice for non-bleeding injuries(ex, bruises).
- Blood lose cause pain and more severe conscious lose.
- Some of punctured organs now cause three times severe bleeding. (In vanilla punctuered kidney, lungs and liver etc doesn't cause additional blood loss, only heart and neck does.)
- Go Juice pain reducion increased to 80% from 10%, and increase blood filteration and blood pumping.
